edu.mccc.cos210.regex

Class NFA

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mccc.cos210.ds.ListGraph
      • edu.mccc.cos210.regex.NFA
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Graph

    public class NFA
extends ListGraph
    Takes a posix expression, and builds NFA. Example posix expression: ca•t•ab|c|d|*• Equivalent infix: cat[a-d]
